title: Payday 3 players "will have to have an online connection"
description: Payday 3 cannot be played without an internet connection, and fans are not happy at all…

title: Microsoft moves "another step closer to the finish line" as FTC loses final appeal to prevent the Activision Blizzard acquisition
description: The Ninth Circuit has now denied the "motion of injunctive relief", leaving Microsoft free to complete the acquisition.

title: When you wish upon a star: Disney-themed Fujifilm X100V unveiled
description: A very limited batch of Disney-themed Fujifilm X100V’s has been made for collection in Hong Kong only later this month

title: The Apple Watch Ultra 2 is rumored to be coming with 3D printed parts
description: A reputable analyst says the premium smartwatch is landing this year, with changes to the manufacturing process.

title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 gets spotted at an airport, on a celebrity wrist
description: Tottenham Hotspur soccer player Son Heung-min has been wearing what seems to be Samsung's new smartwatch.

title: Another 2-year wait is almost over for Windows 11 users, this time for Paint’s dark mode
description: Believe it or not, dark mode for Paint was actually teased before Windows 11 was even launched.

title: Google's new AI tool can help organize your messy Google Docs files
description: NotebookLM can quickly summarize notes for college students and professionals, plus ask questions to help in learning.
